actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to establish two twelve year terms of office for Judges of the Supreme Court.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits the term of office of a Justice of the Supreme Court to two terms of twelve years each. Applies such limitation to persons appointed after the date of ratification.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to establish two twelve year terms of office for Judges of the Supreme Court.
